800810.name: Aegis Defenders Original Soundtrack
800810.description:
The Aegis Defenders Original Soundtrack is composed by Riley Koenig, lead composer for Power Up Audio. It features 14 original tracks that blend together old-school synth elements with more traditional Japanese RPG orchestral music.

TRACK LIST


1. Main Title
2. Ruinhunters of Annwyn
3. Ruins of Sen
4. Temple of the Goddess Kanzeon
5. Nereis Desert
6. The Catacombs of Vaara
7. Jheon, the Capital of Indra
8. Aegis Awakens, Final Battle
9. Aegis Theme
10. Caravan
11. Defend
12. Bart's Theme
13. Clu's Theme
14. End Credits

All tracks are presented in MP3 and FLAC format, placed in your Aegis Defenders folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Aegis Defenders\Soundtrack
...Steam\steamapps\common\Aegis Defenders\SoundtrackFLAC
800810.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
